duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome and assist customers with genuine and friendly enthusiasm, both in person and over the phone.
Use systems to manage customer flow, maintain 5-star customer service, and address customer concerns with confidence.
Support inventory management by processing orders and ensuring first-quality standards for all merchandise.
Effectively handle cash wrap processes and transactions with accuracy.
Execute new processes, behaviors, and programs as assigned.
Offer additional products to meet 7% daily sales goal and adapt style to support and influence team members.
Follow all loss prevention and security processes and policies.
Focus on own development and learning, complete all assigned training for ongoing development.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent degree. 1-2 years prior retail experience preferred, and prior experience with computerized POS system.
